Entry.1:
Mena Camp. Pyramids, nr Cairo,-

Double Coy, Organization adopted in A.I.F. New Drill

Visited
Entry.2:
Inf. & Hooke

Gazetted Captain A.I.F. Order 50. Dated
Entry.3:
2 January

Platoon Drill. Gen. Administration.

3 January

Church Parade. Gen. Administration.
Entry.4: Parade. Rode around Pyramids. Ev touch of influenza – reservoirs burst.
Entry.8: Rec letter dated Dec 9th from Win. also from Davis & home. Gen. Administration. Posted mail to Win. Dust storms rain
Entry.9: To Cairo with Col Hawley. Ratten & Smith. Visited Citadel Mosque of Mohamed Aly & Egyptian Bazaar. Dinner at Continental Hotel “Kursaal"
Entry.11: Posted shawl & Table Centre home. Coy Training & filling in old trenches. Ev. Lecture by Ross. Rec Cable from “Thanks Cables, Well, Much Love Pater"
Entry.12: Coy Training. Ev. Received letter from Win dated
Entry.14: Coy. Training. Pay. Ev. Lecture by Capt. Wagstaff.
Entry.16: 1pm. Div Signal scheme all night show. Orders to be ready to Embark within 12 hrs
Entry.17: 6.am. Orders to embark at Alexandria first train to leave Cebu El Ela at 10.40 pm. Second at 4.40 am on
Entry.19: Packing up. Fearful dust Storms G.S.Waffons. Left Mena Camp route march to Cairo 5pm. Entrained 10 pm
Entry.20:
Arrived Alexandria 4.30a.m. Embarked on Transport Devanka". P & O East India.

Loading troops stores & horses all day.

Total 33 off. 985 O.R. 79 H.

12TH Infy-,
Entry.21:
ENG, & 3rd AMG.

Posted letter to Win.

2 March

Took on Pontoons for disembarkation

10.30 am left wharf. Alexandria destination unknown.

Detached Force. Aust Div under Col McLafan.

3rd Bde. Ist Eng. AMC.A.S.C. & Am Col. Details. on 

suffolk. MALDA. NIZAM. DEVANHA
Entry.22: Transport Devanha. Fine. Calm. Course N.N.W.
Entry.23:
7.am. Arrived on Island of Lemnos. Anchored in small Harbour off PORT MUDROS NAVAL BASE in company with British & French fleet M.S Blenheim, Grafton, Triumph, Prince George, “Beure FRENCH, Dartmouth, ALBION with Submarines & Destroyers

Very fine weather & beautiful panorama.
Entry.24:
Remainder of convoy, “detached force" arrived during afternoon.

awaiting orders for disembarking
Entry.25:
2 “Castle line" transports with R.M.L.I.arrive

Went on board “IONIAN" for ORDERS.

posted . A.S.P.C. to Win & home also letter to Win.
Entry.26:
CHURCH.PARADE.

afternoon. landed with C.Coy ashore for exercise. Marched thro’
Entry.27: Landed Battalion shore for route march. very wet & muddy.
Entry.28:
Landed Battalion ashore for manoeuvres with Brigade. route march – Bivouac & attack.

Return to Ship. very stiff.seas

Two French Transports arrived.
Entry.29:
Commenced landing Battalion for route march had to discontinue leaving 60 & 1 boy ashore. Weather very rough.

another Transport arrived.

Russian Cruiser “ASKOLO" in Harbour

This out of world hole. no news. no mail. within 30 miles of the front & can’t get at it.

Interesting collection of British Naval Admiral, massive off. Aust. Greek, Russian, French, General & staff on
Entry.30:
Coy. Training

Letters from home 2 from Win dated 11 &
Entry.32:
Coy. Training

Letters from Tas & 1 from Win dated
Entry.34:
Coy. Training

Climbed Pyramid & visited inside.
Entry.35:
Church Parade & Inspection by Gen Birdwood received miniature from Win

Writing to Win & home
Entry.37:
Letter from Win dated Dec 23rd 

Coy Training
Entry.39:
30 range musketry commenced 
all day

Cairo – arrangements for funeral Pte. Bishop

British Consulate
Entry.41:
morning, musketry

afternoon Gen Correspondence

Ev Concert 12th Bath Whitfeld,
Entry.42:
Church parade

Div. Duties. Writing to Win

Ev. with Weddell. – Posted mail to Win & home.

Musketry Range.

Field Practices. Individual.

Ev. Letter from Win dated Dec. 26th.
Entry.44:
4.30 a.m Orders for movement of 3rd Bde.issued.

5.40 a.m Battn moved off with 1st Line Transport.

Musketry Field Practices

Lecture to officers re Turnout in Dark.

Letters from home & Tas

Dust storm

Coy. Training

New Zealanders sent to Canal. at Ismalia Clearing Hospital. Col. Giblin etc to Ismalia

First scrap at Kantara.

Ev. Night operations by all boys.

Letter from Win dated
Entry.49:
